message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses learning algorithms for recurrent neural networks, which are primarily studied in the field of neural engineering (cs.NE) and machine learning (cs.LG). The focus on biologically inspired mechanisms suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the mention of neuromorphic hardware suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the field of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NI).
